title: Hello World
subtitle: This is a test of application internationalization with NextJS
content: En this page /home, the language option is obtained through the URL parameters. But here's an issue, if we add a link that goes to /without-Internationalization-link, you'll notice that the language is not maintained, this is because we're not passing the language as a parameter. To solve this, we can use the usePathname hook from nextjs to get the current language and pass it as a parameter in the link.
swithLanguage: Change the language and then click on the link below
